questiontext.text: Which of the following is an example of a mixed design?

generalfeedback.text:
There are no repeated measurement in this design.
(An employee can either follow or not follow the training not both. In this case, there is a 2-way ANOVA but not a repeated measures design.)

Language
English & Nederlands

M&T Mixed design ANOVA
Default value

M&T MVA
Standaardwaarde

answer.text: An investigation of the effect that gender of employees has on choice of training programme adopted.
An investigation of the effect that the gender of an accountant has on month’s-end reporting errors among accountants that followed training and accountants that did not follow training
None of the other answers describes a mixed design
An investigation of the effect that an employee’s gender has on the age of attaining a senior management position
